name: Phillips 66 Company
summary: Phillips 66 Company is a publicly traded American multinational energy company headquartered in Houston, Texas. It specializes in refining, transporting, and marketing natural gas liquids and petrochemicals, and operates globally with approximately 13,200 employees. The company was formed in 2012 as a spin-off from ConocoPhillips and is ranked among the top 30 on the Fortune 500 list.
